section.title: Overview
section.para: The proto_sctp module is an optional transport module (shared library) which exports the required logic in order to handle SCTP-based communication. (socket initialization and send/recv primitives to be used by higher-level network layers)
Once loaded, you will be able to define "sctp:" listeners in your script.

section.title: &osips; Modules
section.para:
The following modules must be loaded before this module:
None.

section.title: External Libraries or Applications
section.para:
The following libraries or applications must be installed before running &osips; with this module loaded:
None.

section.title: sctp_port (integer)
section.para: The default port to be used by all SCTP listeners.
